## **Object:** Create the object named _Role Change Request_.

[Form:** Create the _Potential Manager's Assessment_ form.](developing-applications/developing-low-code-applications/app-builder/creating-the-role-change-request-object.md#form**-create-the-_potential-managers-assessment_-form.)
## **Form:** Create the _HR Assessment_ form.
developing-applications/developing-low-code-applications/app-builder/creating-the-role-change-request-object.md#form**-create-the-_hr-assessment_-form.
